content:
THE HOLIDAYS ARE OH, SO BRIGHT AT BAKERSFIELD’S BEST EVENT VENUE.

Let us plan your family or office holiday party. You’ll treat your employees to an unforgettable corporate holiday party with gourmet food and drink from Bakersfield’s premier restaurant and event space. Don’t worry, it’s more affordable than you think. We’ll take care of all the details so you can enjoy the season.

Reserve your party by October 31 and choose a special holiday gift just for YOU!

Download Our Padre Hotel Holiday Menu

Call today to start planning! 661-427-4900
